Package com.epam.havryliuk.restaurant.controller.command.orderCommand

Class SetNextStatusCommand

java.lang.Object
com.epam.havryliuk.restaurant.controller.command.orderCommand.SetNextStatusRequestHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class SetNextStatusCommand extends Object implements Command
Command changes Order Statuses to the next position.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      The command method gets the next booking status that has to be set in order, then checks if the user has rights to do it, and if user has its, asks service to change the status by id. If some unforeseen situation occurs, method catches the appropriate exception and sends corresponding message to user.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface Command
      Throws:
      IOException

    • checkAccessRights

      private void checkAccessRights(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession session, BookingStatus nextBookingStatus) throws AuthenticationException
      Checks if user has the rights to change the order status.
      Parameters:
      nextBookingStatus - Booking status that needs to be set as next Status
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - when user doesn't have right to change it, for example if User Role is Manager than he can't change Booking status from "Booking" to "New", or if User Role is User, Status also can't be changed from "New" to "Cooking", and so on.

    • getNextBookingStatus

      private BookingStatus getNextBookingStatus(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Method retrieves current BookingStatus from the request, and returns the status that has to be set next.

    • getBookingAccessRoles

      private static Map<BookingStatus,Role> getBookingAccessRoles()
      Map contains the booking statuses and correspondent user roles that has rights to set that statuses.
